reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Program to strengthen the national response to HIV/AIDS and health systems in Niger

description.narrative: Niger - HIV - Ministère de Santé Publique, de la Population et des Affaires Sociales - MSP. This program has the following goals: Contribuer à une réduction de 75% des nouvelles infections par le VIH et à une réduction de 75% des décès d'ici 2022/Contributing to a 75% reduction in new HIV infections and 75% reduction in deaths by 2022. Renforcer la demande et l'offre de soins et de services de qualité à toute la population/Strengthening the demand for and supply of quality care and services to the entire population. The objectives of this program are: Réduire de 75% les nouvelles infections à VIH sont d’ici 2022/Reduce new HIV infections by 75% by 2022. Améliorer la qualité de vie de 90% des PVVIH d‘ici à 2022/Improving the quality of life for 90% of PLWH by 2022. Assurer une gouvernance efficiente de la Réponse nationale au VIH/SIDA/Ensuring efficient governance of the National Response to HIV/AIDS. Améliorer la gouvernance et le leadership/Improving governance and leadership. Offrir des prestations de soins et de services de qualité/Providing quality care and services. Assurer un financement durable du secteur de la santé/Ensuring sustainable financing of the health sector. Assurer une gestion adéquate y compris une maintenance des équipements/Ensure proper management including equipment maintenance. Développer l'information sanitaire intégrant les nouvelles technologies et de la recherche/Developing health information integrating new technologies and research

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for NER-H-MSP
Percentage of adults (15 and above) on ART among all adults living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of children (under 15) on ART among all children living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-positive new and relapse TB patients on ART during TB treatment
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number of people in prisons and other closed settings reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Timeliness of facility reporting: Percentage of submitted facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are received on time per the national guidelines
Percentage of health facilities with tracer medicines for the three diseases available on the day of the visit or day of reporting
Number of people in prisons or other closed settings that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Completeness of facility reporting: Percentage of expected facility monthly reports (for the reporting period) that are actually received
Number of community based organizations that received a pre-defined package of training
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Percentage of pregnant women who know their HIV status
Percentage of HIV-exposed infants receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of people living with HIV newly initiated on ART who were screened for TB
Impact indicator for NER-H-MSP
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of people living with HIV
Outcome indicator for NER-H-MSP
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a non regular partner
